section.heading: Applicability.
section.text: The rights and responsibilities established by this chapter shall apply:

para.text: During the 3-year period beginning 180 days from October 3, 1990, to any employer who employs 50 or more persons in the District; and
After the 3-year period beginning 180 days from October 3, 1990, to any employer who employs 20 or more persons in the District.
